channel.title: Steve Herrod on Adventures in Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Steve Herrod on Adventures in Hugo

item.title: Goodbye Mr. Herrod
item.description: SearchserverVirtualization published an article today called “Experts weigh in on CTO Herrod’s departure, future of VMware” where I have been quoted in regard toSteve Herrod’sÂ departure from VMware. While the quote itself is correct, I feel that there is a need to further expand on what I said, in the context it was given in. So here it is, my entire response: My reaction to Steve Herrods departure is probably on par with just about everyone else's, one of surprise.
